level.heading: FAILURE TO APPEAR FOR A HEARING (ยง 17-2414)

level.text: If a person who filed a petition for review does not appear and no continuance has been or is granted, the Board may hear the evidence of the witnesses who appear.
The Board may also proceed to consider the matter and render a decision on the basis of evidence before it, in the manner required by ยง2418.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: ยง 22.3 of Regulation No. 73-13, approved May 24, 1973, 19 DCR 1147, 1150 (June 11, 1973), 25 DCRR ยง 22.3.
